channel.title: Black Mesa
channel.description:
who has been playing and how far are you?
i just got to the surface of the black mesa research facility.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:3, topic:460016"][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=562926.msg4103774#msg4103774 date=1347767750]

who has been playing and how far are you?

i just got to the surface of the black mesa research facility.

Did you get it via Steam? I can’t find it on there, downloading independently ATM.
[/quote]it’s not on steam…[/quote]
Oh, well I read an article about it saying that it would be available on Steam soon, just didn’t specify a date
